duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight and review of all aerodynamic aspects of clean sheet engine development and certification process.
Conceptual design, analysis, validation, and test of aerodynamic components.
Integration of work in a team, interfacing with the customer to define and document requirements.
Making technical presentations internally and to customers.
Maintain sensitive and confidential information as required by company and government requirements.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Aerospace or Mechanical Engineering.
